summary: Love for Sale is a romantic comedy about Trey (Jackie Long), a twenty-something delivery guy that can't seem to catch a break. Trey's whole life is in shambles- no money for college, girls ... See full summary »

Santana|Richard Lawson|Shawty Hughley Young|Lamont King|Jenique Bennett|Ayesha Curry|Sanethia Dresch|Lutfy Mandhiry Jr.|Candice Somersett|Jon Stafford|Barbara Weetman|Timothy Woodward Jr.
title: Love for Sale
